column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I think I have my found my new favorite place in town.  Bavette's is great; it's everything I had hoped Maude's would be
column2: and more!  The ambiance is beautiful
column3: it's as though you walked into Babette's Supper Club on Boardwalk Empire... I take it Brendan Sodikoff is a huge fan
column5: so am I!  From the 1920's themed music
column6: to the rich velvet and dark wood
column7: Bavette's will make you feel comfortable and encourage you to stay awhile.
